properties.areaDesc: Star Valley; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 7 at 1:46AM MST until January 9 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
...More snow for western Wyoming...

.Mainly light snow will continue today. After a lull tonight,
moderate to occasionally heavy snow will develop before sunrise
Wednesday morning and continue on and off into Thursday morning.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 in the
mountains; 2 to 5 inches in the Star Valley.

* WHERE...Star Valley and Salt River and Wyoming Ranges.

* WHEN...From 5 AM Wednesday to noon MST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could become difficult due to slick and snow
covered roads. Areas of blowing snow could sharply reduce
visibility over the mountains and open areas.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM WEDNESDAY TO NOON MST THURSDAY
